turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello there, how can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like to place a coffee order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok coffee order at starbucks is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a venti caramel macchiato with an extra shot of espresso and 1% and extra whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so that is a Venti machiatto, with 1% milk and extra whipped cream is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And also, an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok extra shot of expresso, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me confirm your order for you, one moment please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so that is a 1 order of Venti machiatto, 1% milk with extra whipped cream and extra shot of expresso, is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: close to Greensboro, North Carolina.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok Greensboro, NC is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we have a starbucks at North Carolina A & T State University is that ok for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's too far. Is there one on Wendover?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me find one closer to you, one moment please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wendover Avenue would be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok looking for a starbucks close to windover ave.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would that be west or east?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Windover East.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok we have a starbuck Shops on Battleground is that ok for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I can go over to Battle Ground.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok we have 1 order of Venti machiatto, 1% milk with extra whipped cream and extra shot of expresso placed with the shop on battleground for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long will it be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: drink has been ordered at the store and will be ready for pickup in 10 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I'll be there. No, that was all. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.
